##Progress on Some Harder Problems in R

###1. Fizz Buzz Problem
```{r}
for(i in 1:100)
  if(i%%3==0){
    print("Fizz")}
  if(i%%5==0){
  print( "Buzz" )}
  if(i%%3==0 && i%%5==0){
  print( "FizzBuzz" )}
```

###2. Frequency Counts
```{r}
Sent<-" Here I am doing harder problems"
table(unlist(strsplit(Sent,split="")))
```

###3. Random number generator
```{r}
a<-runif(100,0,100)
hist(a)
```

###4. Create a multiplication table
```{r}
e<-c(2,3,1,5,6,8)
e*3
```
